thread.title: Very quiet hotel in good location!
thread.title_full: Very quiet hotel in good location! - Review of Premier Inn London Wandsworth Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: cjs3454
title: Very quiet hotel in good location!
text: This is the third time i've stayed here when visiting London Olympia for an event. The hotel is extremely quiet, I barely heard another person and I slept very well! The hotel is well located with good transport links (bus stops right outside) and plenty of shops and restaurants right across the road! I would happily stay here again in the future.
